short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app hide the number of watching now, rating, viewers, and subscribers on youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The following settings are possible for youtube.
ãƒ»Hide the views and WatchingNow 
ãƒ»Hide the rating 
ãƒ»Hide the subscribers
ãƒ»Hide the comment
ãƒ»Hide the comment rating

YouTube specifications (roughly)
ãƒ» Hide the number of views on the Top page
ãƒ» Hide the number of Watching Now on the Top page
ãƒ» Hide the number of subscribers on the channel page
ãƒ» Hide the number of views on the channel page
ãƒ» Hide the number of views on the video page
ãƒ» Hide the number of Watching Now on the video page
ãƒ» Hide the rating of the video page
ãƒ» Hide the number of subscribers on the video page
ãƒ» Hide the number of views of the video on the side of the video page
ãƒ» Hide the comment on the video page
ãƒ» Hide the comment rating on the video page

--------------------------------------------------------
Please use this,If you want to hide the number of viewers and Watching Now on Twitch.
Hide Youtube Viewers and Ratings - Chrome Store Page
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hide-twitch-viewer-count/mflpplkkbeohfhkdbjfciehbkgmmdapg


I made this for myself, so I do not customize pages that I do not usually see.
If you have any requests, please use the following Twitter or Link

Click here for details and requests. ( Note or Twitter )
https://note.com/siroiudon/n/nfcdb37f1bb52

1.1.9:Partial update to new UI
1.1.8:Partial update to new UI(rating

1.1.6:Partial update to new UI
1.1.4 : Dealing with youtube UI changes (provisional version)

Changed to only hide the number of ratings for comments.(e.g. Reply button for comments, etc. is shown)
